label: AB2_hP72_192_m_j2kl-001
title: AlPO$_{4}$ Structure
comments: Here, the metallic (``M'') sites are alloyed, Al$_{0.5}$P$_{0.5}$. The Jmol image represents the M sites with aluminum atoms. Polytypes of this compound also appear in space groups \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C_hP72_168_2d_8d_2d-001}{$P6$ \#168 (AB4C\_hP72\_168\_2d\_8d\_2d)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C_hP72_184_d_4d_d-001}{$P6_{3}mc$ \#184 (AB4C\_hP72\_184\_d\_4d\_d)}.
